PayoutInterval.label: Payout Every (Minutes)
PayoutInterval.tooltip: The interval in minutes in which active viewer's receive points.

PayoutAmount.label: Payout Amount (Points)
PayoutAmount.tooltip: The amount of points a viewer receives on every payout interval.

DecayActive.label: Point Decay
DecayActive.tooltip: Inactive viewers lose points after some time.

DecayViewerAmount.label: The
DecayViewerAmount.tooltip: The amount of top viewers affected by the decay.

DecayCooldown.label: Starts Losing Points After (Hours)
DecayCooldown.tooltip: Streamtime since the last chat activity after a viewer loses points.

DecayInterval.label: Then Loses Points Every (Hours)
DecayInterval.tooltip: Streamtime after which a viewers loses points again.

DecayFixed.label: Decay Type
DecayFixed.tooltip:
Fixed: a viewer loses a fixed amount on each decay.
Stacking: a viewer loses 1% more than on the last decay.

DecayAmount.label: Decay Amount (%) - Fixed Mode Only
DecayAmount.tooltip: The amount of points a viewers loses in percent.

AnnouncePayout.label: Announce Payout In Chat
AnnouncePayout.tooltip: Sends a chatmessage about the payout.

AnnounceDiscord.label: Send Score Summary To Discord
AnnounceDiscord.tooltip: Announces the score summary in discord after the script gets closed.
